Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 44th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1970...
Traded from Minnesota to Detroit on 2/13/1970 (Going to MIN: P C. Seelbach. Going to DET: 1B M. Ivie)...
Injured on 9/3/1972 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/1/1979 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 7/21/1983, off Keith MacWhorter (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/29/1983, off John Denny (CLE)...
Injured on 9/4/1984 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Drafted in 5th round, 100th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1987...
Injured on 4/5/1990 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/10/1991 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 9/7/1992 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
